document_data.name: Merciful Court
document_data.mainbody: The '''Merciful Court''' was the [[divine realm]] of [[Sharindlar]], the [[dwarven pantheon|dwarven goddess]] of healing and mercy.
document_data.Description: The realm was a circle of standing stones located on a foothill. It hosted nightly dances in honor of Sharindlar.
document_data.Cosmography: In the [[Great Wheel cosmology]], the Merciful Court was located in [[Nidavellir]], the third layer of [[Ysgard]]. While in the [[World Tree cosmology]], it was located in [[Dwarfhome]], a [[Celestial planes|celestial plane]] shared by the members of the Dwarven pantheon. Due to its location near the bulk of Dwarfhome's main mountain, Sharindlar was able to moderate interactions between [[Moradin]] and all other dwarven deities, including even the [[duergar]] deities who dwelt in [[Hammergrim]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The realm was inhabited by [[Ysgardian dwarves]], as well as [[dryad]]s, [[einheriar]], [[foo dog]]s, [[hollyphant]]s, [[korred]]s, [[lillend]]i, [[linnorm]]s, [[sylph]]s, and [[sunfly|sunflies]] who served the Shining Dancer.
